name: Parking Madness (itch)
description:
How to play:
Use WASD to drive car.

Use IJKL to quickly drift car to corresponding direction.

Don't let the timer on top of your car run out.

Park to the marked spot as quickly as possible to gather more points.

Press 'N' when prompted to park next car.

Press 'F' to move camera higher and plan your path.

You don't lose points for driving recklessly.

Drive fast, park faster and have fun!

P.S. IJKL may help you get out of a bad spot if stuck by another car!

Previously created Content:
Meshes are from Polygon City and Polygon Town Packs.
VehicleBP was from AdvancedVehicleBP but expanded with drift mechanic and camera positioning.
Drift sound from here: https://freesound.org/people/DeMarkracy/sounds/70068/
Level audio from here:  https://freesound.org/people/jammerboy70/sounds/398640/

All code was done in BP during the jam. It's a mess and there are still bugs here and there.

The game package is small in size so it's eligible for TINY AWARD category as well.

How this game fits the theme (Running out of space)?
You work as car-parking attendant. Cars constantly keep coming but there are only so many empty parking spaces left!
